name: co2_emission
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool electricity_carbon_footprint_germany.
Tool description: CO2 Footprint of current electricity in Germany.
API description: Fetches the carbon emissions in grams per Kilo-Watt-Hour for electricity in Germany based on the given date. Allows retrieving both the latest and historical data back to the year 2017.

date.description: The date for which to retrieve carbon emission data. Accepted formats include 'YYYY-MM-DD', 'MM/DD/YYYY', or Unix Timestamp (in milliseconds). Defaults to '2022-08-20'.
